BasicDescription.Title: World News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news updates from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Meridian: Writing
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Harriett Gilbert explores fiction and non-fiction, plays and poetry, lyrics and letters, and talks with a wide variety of writers and readers.

BasicDescription.Title: Revolver
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A musician or leading music journalist lends a critical ear to the latest hip, innovative albums of the moment.

BasicDescription.Title: Discovery
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Impossible Visions: Martin Redfern takes a look at the things scientists can see with the aid of microscopes and scanners.

BasicDescription.Title: Sports International
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Mike Costello talks to a sporting celebrity who has made the headlines in their career in on way or the other.

BasicDescription.Title: Newshour
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News, comment and analysis from around the world. Newshour brings you the latest live reports on events all over the globe.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Analysis of the key business issues of the day, with up-to-date information on key currency rates, commodity prices and stock market indices.

BasicDescription.Title: British News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news and comment from Britain.

BasicDescription.Title: Sports Roundup
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sports Roundup brings you sports news, stories and results from all around the world. The team of global correspondents collect stories, scores and interviews.

BasicDescription.Title: The World Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News and analysis from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Outlook
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The World Service's daily magazine programme.

BasicDescription.Title: Westway
BasicDescription.Synopsis: BBC World Service's drama set in the vibrant community around a busy health centre in West London.

BasicDescription.Title: World Briefing
BasicDescription.Synopsis: World news and despatches.

BasicDescription.Title: From Our Own Correspondent
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The background to the news from BBC correspondents around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: John Peel
BasicDescription.Synopsis: John Peel selects and plays new tracks from the most innovative pop talent from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Heart And Soul
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Mongolian Mysteries: French pianist Corine Sombrun travels to Mongolia and neighbouring regions in Russia, where she goes in search of shamanic healing methods.

BasicDescription.Title: Off The Shelf
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Kerry Fox reads Sarah Murgatroyd's book about the trials and tribulations of innocents abroad crossing the deserts of Australia.

BasicDescription.Title: The Music Biz
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Mark Coles with a series about the music industry, from discussions about piracy to reports from hotspots around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Go Digital
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Tracey Logan covers the latest developments in the field of international technology, in association with BBCi's Technology site.

BasicDescription.Title: Omnibus
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A Level Playing Field: Kati Whitaker talks to a group of disabled people who petitioned for greater rights in Bangladesh in November 2000. She hears their stories and discovers how they found a voice.

BasicDescription.Title: What's The Problem?
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Have you got a problem? Our panel of experts offer advice on everything from medical and emotional concerns to dilemmas at work.

BasicDescription.Title: Analysis
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The programme that examines topical aspects of current international issues.

BasicDescription.Title: Europe Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: All the latest news, analysis and comment, from around Europe.

BasicDescription.Title: World News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news updates from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: The Music Biz
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Mark Coles with a series about the music industry, from discussions about piracy to reports from hotspots around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: John Peel
BasicDescription.Synopsis: John Peel selects and plays new tracks from the most innovative pop talent from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: One Planet
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Life Of The Land: The series investigates the commercial, social and political pressures that influence land use.

BasicDescription.Title: Heritage
BasicDescription.Synopsis: In this programme Heritage looks at the restoration process in Havana of buildings dating back to the 16th century.

BasicDescription.Title: Newshour
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News, comment and analysis from around the world. Newshour brings you the latest live reports on events all over the globe.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Analysis of the key business issues of the day, with up-to-date information on key currency rates, commodity prices and stock market indices.

BasicDescription.Title: British News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news and comment from Britain.

BasicDescription.Title: Sports Roundup
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sports Roundup brings you sports news, stories and results from all around the world. The team of global correspondents collect stories, scores and interviews.

BasicDescription.Title: Off The Shelf
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Kerry Fox reads Sarah Murgatroyd's book about the trials and tribulations of innocents abroad crossing the deserts of Australia.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: News and analysis from around the world.
